demo1Description: Straight forward assignment submission and navigation. Never feel lost in your dashboard.
demo2Description: Get clear feedbacks with walk through videos and notes from your instructor to help you get better.
demo3Description: Support is just a few click away for your assignments, or to explore different subjects.
cardText1: Simple, and easy ways to review assignments.
cardText2: Most recent assignments available up front in cards.
cardText3: View or edit options righ from the card.
